hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"When any one of you goes to the Gha'it (toilet to defecate), let him take with him three stones and clean himself with them, for that will suffice him

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِجْتِزَاءِ فِي الاِسْتِطَابَةِ بِالْحِجَارَةِ دُونَ غَيْرِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Permitting The Usage Of Stones For Cleaning Without Anything Else
